corrections.error: 12 erros finais de TypeScript: TS2322 (ColDef typing em AG Grid), TS2769 (AG Grid overloads com groupIncludeTotalFooter/grandTotalRow, Zod enum sem as const), TS2345 (zodResolver type mismatch), TS17001 (JSX duplicate style attribute), TS2322 (HTMLMotionProps spread conflict).
